purpose: Facilitate the creation and management of complex multi-agent systems for various AI-driven tasks.
principle: Builds on agent-based modeling and coordination patterns to enable seamless interaction between specialized AI agents.
reusability: Offers a modular architecture allowing developers to plug in different AI agents and customize their interactions.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited documentation and support for complex use cases.
name: OpenManus
description: No fortress, purely open ground.  OpenManus is Coming.
highlight: OpenManus is a framework for orchestrating and coordinating multiple specialized AI agents.
